content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

--Examine data types for the columns
 EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) as len_location_Id,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) as len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) as len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) as len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)

    )
    AS [result]


SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

--UTF-8 collation

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)

    )
    AS [result];

--Query a subset of columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
       
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50)

    )
    AS [result];

--Allocate a column name
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
       Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2
        

    )
    AS [result];


--Fix Column Names
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', FIRST_ROW = 2, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4

    )
    AS [result]

    --Create external data source
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
    WITH(
        LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net'
    )
--Query newly create data source
    SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', FIRST_ROW = 2, FIELDTERMINATOR = ',', ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4

    )
    AS [result];


DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS cal;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    ) AS cal'


SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date date,
        year SMALLINT,
        month TINYINT,
        day TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT
    )
     AS cal;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
 
 SELECT  rate_code_id, rate_code
 FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/rate_code.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',  FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );


--Multi-Line-JSON

 SELECT  rate_code_id, rate_code
 FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/rate_code_multi_line.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',  FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );  --No difference

-- This is auto-generated code
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Select data from folder

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',  --*.csv forr all csv files
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Select data from subfolders

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Use more than 1 wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--File metadata function filename()

SELECT
    TOP 100 result.filename() as file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename()


SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-02.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename()


SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-02.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)


--Use file path in where clause


SELECT
    
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
    GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

--Identify the inferred data types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100 * FROM
OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'


--Define columns and data types
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )AS [result]


--Select only reqd columns

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH(
        
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        
        trip_type INT
    )AS [result]


    --Query using wildcard characters

  SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data


--Get filename
  SELECT TOP 100 
  trip_data.filename() AS file_name,
  trip_data.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data

--Query from sub folders
  SELECT TOP 100 
  trip_data.filename() AS file_name,
  trip_data.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data


--Use filepath to target partitions
SELECT trip_data.filepath(1) as year,
    trip_data.filepath(2) as month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS trip_data
    WHERE trip_data.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND trip_data.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
    GROUP BY trip_data.filepath(1),trip_data.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY trip_data.filepath(1),trip_data.filepath(2);
